headline: Wall Street Brokers Start Trading Insurer Claims From LA Fires
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Wall Street brokers have started selling insurers’ claims tied to Los Angeles’ deadly wildfires, which may trigger a payout from the utilities blamed for the destruction, according to people familiar with the matter.
